awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: Analysis of Solitary Wave Phenomena
awd_abstract_narration: This project shall concentrate on the analysis of solitary                 wave phenomena.  Several related questions in the analysis of                   solitary waves will be examined, including their existence,                     uniqueness and stability.  In addition, the validity of various                 approximate equations and certain rigorous properties of                        nonlinear dispersive systems of partial differential or integro-                differential equations will be considered.  The tools of                        nonlinear analysis will be supplemented by some numerical                       simulation and the special methods of inverse scattering theory.                The systems to be studied arise in many areas of nonlinear                      science including fluid mechanics, nonlinear optics, solid state                physics, oceanography and meteorology.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
